description: I. Placing and open offer agreements relating to the redemption of the Government's, preference share holdings in RBS and Lloyds, dated 19 January 2009 (RBS) and 7 March 2009 (Lloyds). II. Documents relating to the Government's subscription to Lloyds' rights issue, and to Lloyds' withdrawal from the Asset Protection Scheme (APS) dated 2 and 3 Nov 2009.
